verses.verse: Moreover, when ye shall divide by lot <S%H5307><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> for inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> ye shall offer <S%H7311><s%> an oblation <S%H8641><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> a holy portion <S%H6944><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the land: <S%H776><s%> the length <S%H753><s%> shall be the length <S%H753><s%> of five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> reeds, and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> shall be ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%> This <S%H1931><s%> shall be holy <S%H6944><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the borders <S%H1366><s%> thereof round about. <S%H5439><s%>

Of this <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> there shall be <S%H1961><s%> for <S%H413><s%> the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> in length, with five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> in breadth, square <S%H7251><s%> round about; <S%H5439><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> for the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> thereof.

And of <S%H4480><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> measure <S%H4060><s%> shalt thou measure <S%H4058><s%> the length <S%H753><s%> of five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand, <S%H505><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand: <S%H505><s%> and in it shall be <S%H1961><s%> the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> and the most holy <S%H6944><s%> <S%H6944><s%> place.

The holy <S%H6944><s%> portion of <S%H4480><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> for the priests <S%H3548><s%> the ministers <S%H8334><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> which shall come near <S%H7131><s%> to minister unto <S%H8334><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and it shall be <S%H1961><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> for their houses, <S%H1004><s%> and a holy place <S%H4720><s%> for the sanctuary. <S%H4720><s%>

And the five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> of length, <S%H753><s%> and the ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> of breadth, <S%H7341><s%> shall also the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> the ministers <S%H8334><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> have <S%H1961><s%> for themselves, for a possession <S%H272><s%> for twenty <S%H6242><s%> chambers. <S%H3957><s%>

And ye shall appoint <S%H5414><s%> the possession <S%H272><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> broad, <S%H7341><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> long, <S%H753><s%> over against <S%H5980><s%> the oblation <S%H8641><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> portion: it shall be <S%H1961><s%> for the whole <S%H3605><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And a portion shall be for the prince <S%H5387><s%> on the one side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> and on the other side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> of the oblation <S%H8641><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> portion, and of the possession <S%H272><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the oblation <S%H8641><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> portion, and before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the possession <S%H272><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> from the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6285><s%> westward, <S%H3220><s%> and from the east <S%H6924><s%> side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6285><s%> eastward: <S%H6921><s%> and the length <S%H753><s%> shall be over against <S%H5980><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of the portions, <S%H2506><s%> from the west <S%H3220><s%> border <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1366><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the east <S%H6921><s%> border. <S%H1366><s%>

In the land <S%H776><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> his possession <S%H272><s%> in Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and my princes <S%H5387><s%> shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> oppress <S%H3238><s%> <S%H853><s%> my people; <S%H5971><s%> and the rest of the land <S%H776><s%> shall they give <S%H5414><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> according to their tribes. <S%H7626><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Let it suffice <S%H7227><s%> you, O princes <S%H5387><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> remove <S%H5493><s%> violence <S%H2555><s%> and spoil, <S%H7701><s%> and execute <S%H6213><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> and justice, <S%H6666><s%> take away <S%H7311><s%> your exactions <S%H1646><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
Ye shall have <S%H1961><s%> just <S%H6664><s%> balances, <S%H3976><s%> and a just <S%H6664><s%> ephah, <S%H374><s%> and a just <S%H6664><s%> bath. <S%H1324><s%>

The ephah <S%H374><s%> and the bath <S%H1324><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> measure, <S%H8506><s%> that the bath <S%H1324><s%> may contain <S%H5375><s%> the tenth part <S%H4643><s%> of a homer, <S%H2563><s%> and the ephah <S%H374><s%> the tenth part <S%H6224><s%> of a homer: <S%H2563><s%> the measure <S%H4971><s%> thereof shall be <S%H1961><s%> after <S%H413><s%> the homer. <S%H2563><s%>

And the shekel <S%H8255><s%> shall be twenty <S%H6242><s%> gerahs: <S%H1626><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> shekels, <S%H8255><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> shekels, <S%H8255><s%> fifteen <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> shekels, <S%H8255><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> your mina. <S%H4488><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the oblation <S%H8641><s%> that <S%H834><s%> ye shall offer; <S%H7311><s%> the sixth part <S%H8345><s%> of an ephah <S%H374><s%> of a homer <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2563><s%> of wheat, <S%H2406><s%> and ye shall give the sixth part <S%H8341><s%> of an ephah <S%H374><s%> of a homer <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2563><s%> of barley: <S%H8184><s%>

Concerning the ordinance <S%H2706><s%> of oil, <S%H8081><s%> the bath <S%H1324><s%> of oil, <S%H8081><s%> ye shall offer the tenth part <S%H4643><s%> of a bath <S%H1324><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the kor, <S%H3734><s%> which is a homer <S%H2563><s%> of ten <S%H6235><s%> baths; <S%H1324><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> baths <S%H1324><s%> are a homer: <S%H2563><s%>

And one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H7716><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the flock, <S%H6629><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> two hundred, <S%H3967><s%> out of the fat pastures <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4945><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> for a meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and for a burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> and for peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> to make reconciliation <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> them, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall give <S%H1961><s%> <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> oblation <S%H8641><s%> for the prince <S%H5387><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And it shall be <S%H1961><s%> the prince's part <S%H5921><s%> <S%H5387><s%> to give burnt offerings, <S%H5930><s%> and meat offerings, <S%H4503><s%> and drink offerings, <S%H5262><s%> in the feasts, <S%H2282><s%> and in the new moons, <S%H2320><s%> and in the sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> solemnities <S%H4150><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and the meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and the burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> and the peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> to make reconciliation <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H1157><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> In the first <S%H7223><s%> month, in the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> a young <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> without blemish, <S%H8549><s%> and cleanse <S%H2398><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sanctuary: <S%H4720><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the blood <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1818><s%> of the sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it upon <S%H413><s%> the posts <S%H4201><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> and upon <S%H413><s%> the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H6438><s%> of the settle <S%H5835><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the posts <S%H4201><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> court. <S%H2691><s%>

And so <S%H3651><s%> thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> the seventh <S%H7651><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%> for every one <S%H4480><s%> <S%H376><s%> that erreth, <S%H7686><s%> and for him that is simple: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6612><s%> so shall ye reconcile <S%H3722><s%> <S%H853><s%> the house. <S%H1004><s%>

In the first <S%H7223><s%> month, in the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month, <S%H2320><s%> ye shall have <S%H1961><s%> the passover, <S%H6453><s%> a feast <S%H2282><s%> of seven <S%H7651><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> shall be eaten. <S%H398><s%>

And upon that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall the prince <S%H5387><s%> prepare <S%H6213><s%> for <S%H1157><s%> himself and for <S%H1157><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> a bullock <S%H6499><s%> for a sin offering. <S%H2403><s%>

And seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> of the feast <S%H2282><s%> he shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> rams <S%H352><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> daily <S%H3117><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> and a kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%> daily <S%H3117><s%> for a sin offering. <S%H2403><s%>

And he shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> of an ephah <S%H374><s%> for a bullock, <S%H6499><s%> and an ephah <S%H374><s%> for a ram, <S%H352><s%> and a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> for an ephah. <S%H374><s%>

In the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month, in the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month, <S%H2320><s%> shall he do <S%H6213><s%> the like <S%H428><s%> in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of the seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> according to the sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> according to the burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> and according to the meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and according to the oil. <S%H8081><s%>
